__e: Sweet dreams, my new best friend.
Anyway, if you're there... sweet dreams.
Because if we don't, boys we'll never be able to have a decent dream again.
Because you, my dear, are still a kid, and we want you to stay that way forever.
So I may as well spend the next four and a half minutes staring into your dreamy blue eyes while I watch you die.
Maybe finally I can see behind those calm... beautiful blue eyes and... and finally see you for... for who you really are.
Well, people say I have beautiful blue eyes.
Do you know how beautiful your eyes are when you're angry ?
I will also tell you that, even though your face is not too fair... and you're a bit fat... you have really beautiful eyes.
For him or others, you don't think we just got you out because of your beautiful eyes, eh?
I just gotta say... You guys are so much handsomer in person than anyone knows.
We are beautiful and we are lucky.
No, you're not having two waters. I had a water, and I had a lemonade. I can just bring two waters.
With you I experienced the two most beautiful days of my life. Really!
It was one of the best days of my life.
Those were the happiest days of my life and I want more of those days.
With you I experienced the two most beautiful days of my life. Really!
It was one of the best days of my life.
Those were the happiest days of my life and I want more of those days.
Is that why you've got such lovely hair?
I just have good hair, you know.
For real; now, you still got a nice head of hair.
"Well, now I have three beautiful children who are... are my life."
[Izzie] We're gonna have beautiful kids, don't you think?
